display_name: XHTML 1.0 Strict vim7 xml data file
name: XHTML-1.0-Strict-vim7-xml-data-file
description: This is xml data file for vim7. Not required for regular (X)HTML completion but necessary for mixing (X)HTML with other XML dialects.
install_details:
Put it in: ~/.vim/autoload/xml directory.
How to load read :help :XMLns
